definition: A document that provides a comprehensive overview of an individual's personal and professional background, including education, work experience, skills, and achievements. It is typically used when applying for employment or educational opportunities.

examples.german: Bitte senden Sie Ihren Lebenslauf per E-Mail.
examples.english: Please send your CV by email.

examples.german: Der Lebenslauf sollte alle relevanten Informationen enthalten.
examples.english: The curriculum vitae should include all relevant information.

examples.german: Der Lebenslauf ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil einer Bewerbung.
examples.english: The CV is an important part of an application.
